SELECT NVL(SUM(prt_qty),0) AS prt_qty FROM process_run WHERE TO_DATE(prs_date,'rrrr/MM/dd') = (SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE-1,'rrrr/MM/dd') FROM dual)
SELECT NVL(SUM(prt_out_qty),0) AS prt_qty FROM product_out WHERE TO_DATE(prt_out_date,'rrrr/MM/dd') = (SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/MM/dd') FROM dual)

SELECT NVL(SUM(pi.prs_err_qty),0) AS prt_qty FROM process_inf pi, process_run pr WHERE pr.prs_no = pi.prs_no AND TO_DATE(pr.prs_date,'rrrr/MM/dd') = (SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/MM/dd') FROM dual)
SELECT NVL(SUM(pi.prs_err_qty),0) AS prt_qty FROM process_inf pi, process_run pr WHERE pr.prs_no = pi.prs_no AND TO_DATE(pr.prs_date,'rrrr/MM/dd') = (SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE-1,'rrrr/MM/dd') FROM dual)
SELECT p.prt_name, l.lot_qty FROM lot l, product p WHERE l.mp_code = p.prt_code AND l.mp_code LIKE 'PRD_%' AND l.wh_code = #{whCode}

SELECT NVL(SUM(pr.prt_qty),0) AS prt_qty, pt.prt_code FROM process_run pr, produce pd, product pt WHERE pd.pre_no = pr.pre_no AND pd.prt_code = pt.prt_code AND TO_DATE(pr.prs_date,'rrrr/MM/dd') = (SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/MM/dd') FROM dual) GROUP BY pt.prt_code ORDER BY pt.prt_code

SELECT p.prt_code, NVL(SUM(po.prt_out_qty),0) AS prt_qty FROM product p, product_out po, order_inf oi WHERE p.prt_code = oi.prt_code AND po.order_no = oi.order_no AND TO_DATE(po.prt_out_date, 'rrrr/MM/dd') = (SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'rrrr/MM/dd') FROM dual) GROUP BY p.prt_code ORDER BY p.prt_code

SELECT p.prt_code, NVL(SUM(pi.prs_err_qty),0) AS prt_qty FROM process_inf pi, process_run pr, product p, produce pd WHERE pd.pre_no = pr.pre_no AND pd.prt_code = p.prt_code AND pi.prs_no = pr.prs_no AND TO_DATE(pr.prs_date, 'rrrr/MM/dd') = (SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'rrrr/MM/dd') FROM dual) GROUP BY p.prt_code ORDER BY p.prt_code
SELECT * FROM process

SELECT pr.prs_no, pr.prs_code FROM process_run pr, process_inf pi WHERE pr.prs_no = pi.prs_no AND to_char(pi.prs_sp_hour, 'rrrr/MM/dd HH24:MM:SS') > (SELECT to_char(current_timestamp, 'rrrr/MM/dd HH24:MM:SS') FROM dual) AND to_char(pi.prs_st_hour, 'rrrr/MM/dd HH24:MM:SS') < (SELECT to_char(current_timestamp, 'rrrr/MM/dd HH24:MM:SS') FROM dual)

SELECT p.pre_no, pr.prt_name, p.ins_qty FROM produce p, order_inf oi, orders o, product pr WHERE p.order_no = o.order_no AND o.order_no = oi.order_no AND oi.prt_code = pr.prt_code AND TO_DATE(p.pre_date, 'rrrr/MM/dd') = (SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'rrrr/MM/dd') FROM dual)

SELECT ods.order_no, ods.d_day, e.emp_name FROM orders ods JOIN produce pe ON ods.order_no = pe.order_no JOIN product pt ON pt.prt_code = pe.prt_code JOIN employee e ON e.emp_id = pe.pre_manager WHERE pe.pre_no = #{preNo}
